"Things Hidden in the Sands":
"I want to search for more fragments
left behind by the famous swordsmith,
Zieg. According to my intel, I'll have
to go into the tunnels of Lillipa.

However, the labyrinthine nature of
the tunnels halts trespassers. So,
maybe with your help...
――――――――――――――――――――
Failure: Retire after being incapacitated."
